welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ba, Fiji! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ba has to offer. Sit back, relax, and let the adventure begin!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vatukoula Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Vatukoula Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nadi International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Nadi International Airport serves flights within Fiji.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a fee for access.
